properties.value: Ancient braziers indicate whether someone is currently inside the ironman instance of certain bosses. The braziers can be found outside the rooms of the God Wars Dungeon generals, the Corporeal Beast and Kalphite Lair. When the room is occupied the brazier is lit. They are not visible to regular accounts.

Ancient braziers indicate whether someone is currently inside the ironman instance of certain bosses. The braziers can be found outside the rooms of the God Wars Dungeon generals, the Corporeal Beast and Kalphite Lair. When the room is occupied the brazier is lit. They are not visible to regular accounts.

An Ancient brazier burning outside the Kalphite Queen boss room.

'''Ancient braziers''' indicate whether someone is currently inside the [[ironman]] instance of certain bosses. The braziers can be found outside the rooms of the [[God Wars Dungeon]] generals, the [[Corporeal Beast]] and [[Kalphite Lair]]. When the room is occupied the brazier is lit. They are not visible to regular accounts.

[[File:Ancient brazier.gif|left|thumb|An Ancient brazier burning outside the [[Kalphite Queen]] boss room.]]

{{God Wars Dungeon}}
{{Corporeal Beast}}
{{Kalphite}}
